Alabama Senate District 7 Democratic candidates Rhonda Rose Gaskin and Mitchell Howie sat down with AL.com on May 16 , 2014 , to discuss their race in the upcoming June 3 Democratic primary .
The winner will face the Republican nominee - either incumbent District 7 Sen. Paul Sanford or David Blair , currently president of the Huntsville school board - in the November general election .
Mitchell Howie is a Huntsville lawyer who ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2010 .
Both candidates were asked to respond to the same five questions , and they alternated who went first .
